trans-unit.source: This section includes exercises to help build on information in this section. The step-by-step solutions for the exercises follow each complete exercise.

seg-source.mrk: This section includes exercises to help build on information in this section.
The step-by-step solutions for the exercises follow each complete exercise.

trans-unit.source: All documents created during the exercises must be assigned to the SYS_TRAIN module. Additionally, in order to display the documents, they must be validated and entered in the table of rights.

seg-source.mrk: All documents created during the exercises must be assigned to the SYS_TRAIN module.
Additionally, in order to display the documents, they must be validated and entered in the table of rights.

trans-unit.source: In this exercise, documents with forms will be created and examples of the different form options like input fields or option lists will be shown. Also the transfer and processing of values from one document to another will be explained.

seg-source.mrk: In this exercise, documents with forms will be created and examples of the different form options like input fields or option lists will be shown.
Also the transfer and processing of values from one document to another will be explained.

trans-unit.source: Create a document with a form for recording a text. Specify the system document _CHECKPARAMS as the destination for the form. Create the document on the basis of the information in the table.

seg-source.mrk: Create a document with a form for recording a text.
Specify the system document _CHECKPARAMS as the destination for the form.
Create the document on the basis of the information in the table.

trans-unit.source: Insert a list of options with values from the Language table into the document named TRAIN_3. The TRAIN_2 document should also be adapted so that the value of the new list of options is displayed. It should be possible to select several values from the LANGUAGE list of options.

trans-unit.source: Create a document with the name TRAIN_4 with a Number list of options. The list of options contains the values from the Items table. It should be possible to select several items. The result of document TRAIN_4 refers to document TRAIN_5.

seg-source.mrk: Create a document with the name TRAIN_4 with a Number list of options.
The list of options contains the values from the Items table.
It should be possible to select several items.
The result of document TRAIN_4 refers to document TRAIN_5.

trans-unit.source: In addition, create a document called TRAIN_5 with an input field and a text field that are repeated as a group. The TRAIN_5 document is based on the Items table and displays the group created for each entry found. The quantity for a given item can be specified in the input field. The reference to the document TRAIN_6 is defined through the result.

seg-source.mrk: In addition, create a document called TRAIN_5 with an input field and a text field that are repeated as a group.
The TRAIN_5 document is based on the Items table and displays the group created for each entry found.
The quantity for a given item can be specified in the input field.
The reference to the document TRAIN_6 is defined through the result.
